thread.section_title: DoItYourselfLettering.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of DoItYourselfLettering.com | doityourselflettering.com | 7 of 259
thread.title: Robert

author: Robert
title: Robert
text: This was my firs time dealing with DIY lettering. Their wed site was very user friendly to design your own lettering. They also offer to do the design for you. Turn around from purchase to delivery was less than 1 week. I would say that the quality of the vinyl material is very good and should remain durable for some time. Application was very easy utilizing the directions supplied by DIY. I am currently designing a new name for my boat which I intend to use DIY lettering.
